short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Growing3 is the best Insights tool for your influencer marketing in the Web3 world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
•  Get insights of X(Twitter) influencers in Web3 world.
•  Qualify influencers from X 10x faster and build your own influencers database by shortlisting your favorite profiles right away from the browser.
•  See the engagement stats of Growing3’s analytics for free.
•  If you're a creator, influencer or marketer that wants to compare your engagement stats to other creators, Growing3 is the smoothest way to do so.

Key Features:
•  Get Influencer profile insights at a glance
•  Build your own influencer database

Growing3 gives you the following insights for X(Twitter) influencer:
•  Summary of the influencers
•  Audience size
•  Influencer account overall engagement rate
•  View through rate of influencer posts & videos
•  Top Keywords used

How to use Growing3 Influencer Matcher?
1. Click the "Add to Chrome" button above.
2. Go to the profile of any X(Twitter) influencer
3. Log In/ Sign Up to access insights of influencers - It’s Free!

Who is it for?
•  Web3 Marketing Agencies
•  Freelancer Marketers
•  Web3 Brands
•  Web3 Influencers
